root.name: Konami GB Collection Vol. 1
root.description: Included on the cartridge:Nemesis (titled Gradius on the GBC version)Castlevania: The AdventureWorld Circuit Series (Konami Racing on GBC)Operation C (Probotector on GBC)Curiously, World Circuit Series is called Konami Racing despite that not being the title of the game in any region (World Circuit Series in the US, F-1 Spirit in Japan, and The Spirit of F-1 in UK)
